_header: Thou dearest disciple of Jesu Christ
Subjects: carols, of saints; John the Evangelist, saint
_description: An orison to St. John the Evangelist — five quatrains (aaab) with Latin caudae and burden: ‘Pray for vs to the trinite / Johannes christi care’

OxfBal354.First Lines:
Thow dereste disciple of Ihesu CristeMost best belovid & beste
                    be triste…
OxfBal354.Last Lines:
…But pray we þat we may be thedder browghtWher Riches ys
                    everlastynglyÞat we may stond siker beffore Cristis faceCum
                        venerit iudicareExplicit
